channel.title: Port won't forward?
channel.description:
I'm not a noob, I know networking minimal (for servers/lan connections), and I've even asked a networking teacher and he couldn't help me.
My one port won't foward. Port 80 forwarded on my lan server and people can connect to my website fine. Port 21 works for FTP server. Port 110 and 25 works for my local mail server. Port 43594 won't work on my main desktop, it just won't be detected as open. I've closed all other ports, and just trying to run 43594.
Yes I'm using the right lan ip (this desktop is 192.168.1.4 on the network). I haven't tested it on my laptop yet, to see if it forwarded but I can't see why it wouldn't work on this.
Someone needs to help me.. please D:

item.title: Port won't forward?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

ranger squad:

Are you running the server/anything for port 43594?

Nope, this is the only computer on my network running 43594 port.

edit;
COME ON NETWORK PEOPLE!

Read full topic
